title: endu nODidaru
sahitya:
Endu nODidare cinte I oDalu nishcintarAgihara obbaranu kANe


caraNam 1    brahmanige shira hOgi bDi baLaluva cinte munna mArutige kapiyAda cinte 
manmathage tanu suTTu bUdiyAgiha cinte kaNNu mUruLLavage tiridumba cinte
    caraNam 2    kAmadhEnuvige karedoivaremba cinte kAminiyarige oDava vastra cinte 
sImeyALuva dorege pra doregaLa cinte pAmara narage bareha baradiruva cinte
    caraNam 3    dharmtmarellarige dIna janarA cinte karmAtmarellarige keDuva cinte 
varma beLasuvarige vairi kolluva cinte barmaNage satata mrSTAnna cinte
    caraNam 4    bhaktarige guruvinoLu mukti bEDuva cinte muktarige paramAtma doreva cinte 
yukti ballavage vivEkavADuva cinte viraktanAdage kAma suDuva cinte
    caraNam 5    kSatra rakkasarigellaranu tinnuva cinte nidre bAradavanige rAtri cinte 
kaddu taral-hOdvanige kOLi kUguva cinte muddu purandara viTTalanobbanige nishcinte
